campaign.story:
Review Videos (Updating)
#1 3D printing Nerd 
 #2 WildRoseBuilds
#3. The First Layer
#4 Production video



Imagine a desktop 3D printer that can print faster than average, featuring multiple functions such as auto leveling, laser engraving and bicolor printing using simple add-ons. Plus build quality with premium materials, sleek and ergonomic design.
Now stop imagining. LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK is a reality.  
LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK is our latest and first-ever crowdfunded desktop 3D printer and we chose to launch on Kickstarter for a reason. Kickstarter is always the base of unlimited creativity. Helping to bring the creative projects to life, Kickstarter would be the proven bridge between LOTMAXX and the 3D printing community by bringing us together.
We believe that 3D printing has unlimited potential, and we're only just at the beginning of this emerging industry. 3D printing technology is penetrating widely and deeply across industrial, makers and consumer sectors. It's by launching on Kickstarter and connecting LOTMAXX with backers, getting feedback and conducting discussion that we can make further progress on development of 3D printing.
We're just getting started and your opinions matter to us. 
Establishing ourselves in 2018, LOTMAXX is a cutting-edge technology company specializing in 3D printing. Gathered with more than 100 professionals, experienced developers and engineers from 3D printing, tablet computer and machine manufacturing industries, we've harnessed the great capability of design, research and production of 3D printing.
We want to vitalize the industry with our innovation. By breaking further ground in 3D printing technology, we managed to bring LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK to Kickstarter. It's printing faster, it's more than the average desktop 3D printer.
It's beyond your imagination.
Packing the Aeolus Heat Dissipation system (AHDS) and S Move System (SMS), LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK has effectively boosted the print speed and successfully saved up to 30% average print time*. 
*Source: stats from LOTMAXX lab.   
S Move System
LOTMAXX SC-10 stays cool while printing, thanks to the unique and signature design of its modular nozzles.  The Aeolus Heat Dissipation system (AHDS) is a highly efficient  dissipation system with its uniquely developed four-fan design. This cools the nozzle from all angles, increasing the efficiency of heat dissipation by 42%*(measured in LOTMAXX lab) without compromising sprinting quality and print speed. LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK has three speed modes available: normal, middle, and fast speed, to match your preference and need. Combining the high-speed motor, LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK is a powerhouse that guarantees unparalleled speed as well as the stability.     
The four-fan structure
Printing faster
Auto leveling, laser engraving and bicolor printing, your call. LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK is the whole package. No need to recode and no further adjustment is required, plug and play, it's just that easy!  
There are 2 colors of SC-10 Shark(Deep Purple/Space Gray)

LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK comes with optional automatic bed leveling feature. The ultra-precise technology allows for 0.1mm accuracy. While the unleveled bed might cause nozzle clogging, scratch marks and poor adhesion, the auto leveling is one of the most important benefits that LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK can offer to the quality of your prints. Just tap the touch screen to activate the auto leveling interface, the inductive sensor will probe the heated bed. It precisely measures the print surface's tilt, freeing you from the time-consuming and tricky manual process. Regardless of whether you are a newcomer or a skilled maker, you can enjoy a hassle-free auto leveling with SHARK！
Note: LOTMAXX procures 3D touch & BL touch from suppliers.
Auto-leveling
The 3D Touch
LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK supports an optional 1.6 W laser engraving and allows you to engrave with a wide variety of materials like wood, plastic, leather, PVC, paper and resin. The interchangeable module is extremely easy to apply on. Plug and engrave, simply attach the laser engraver module next to the printhead and you're ready to witness creativity turning into reality.  
Ever so often, it's color making the artwork unique and special. While most of the 3D printers come with just one nozzle, LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK offers optional dual color print head tier. Besides the basic option, you may choose a different package that comes with two extruders and one nozzle. Expand the possibility and upgrade your artwork, why not?
Bicolor printing
The last thing you want is a failed project due to a power-cut, while time and materials have also been wasted. That’s why a resume printing is a must-have feature for 3D printing nowadays. LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK can pick up the disconnection and continue with the previous printing. A tap on the touch screen will just make it right.
Print smoother and print smarter. Don't let the broken filament stop your artwork. The built-in filament sensor detects the filament outage quickly and stops the device wasting materials and models. Once you feed the machine new filaments, LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK will resume the print from where it left off. 
Dual gear extruder:Stable and durable.High extrusion force, ensuring smooth feeding of filament.
Packed with an ultra-silent driver TMC2208, LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK can reduce noise effectively. But that's not just it: pairing a super mute, highly accurate and anti-abrasive V-wheel drive on the X axis, you can still enjoy a high-quality prints with an accuracy of +0.1mm after long-run operation. 

DO NOT DISTURB. Just like the silent mode on mobile phones, LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK allows for silent printing. All it takes is just one tap for the noise to melt away.
The 3.5-inch, highly sensitive touchscreen comes with elastic springs for added convenience. It’s custom-molded to fit in hand thanks to an ergonomic design. The touchscreen allows you to control the print directly, giving instant feedback of your print job details like progress and elapsed time. 

Multiple language systems are common in an increasingly connected world. LOTMAXX realized it as well, that’s why SHARK supports eight languages on its user interface. English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese and Chinese, SHARK has the world’s most commonly used languages ready for you. 
Ergonomic, extra large and designed for comfort. It’s much easier to turn as it provides much larger surface area for your finger to press against. Improved and comfortable grip, a feature that complements bed leveling with ease. 
Extra large knob
LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK is equipped with a flexible and durable steel build plate. Either you are going to glue or remove the models, the plate is making your life easier. With the gantry powered by Anodic oxide technology, the printer is rigid and crafted with premium quality as well. All these enhancements are leveling up your printing experience.
LOTMAXX never compromises on safety. SHARK printer is designed with safety and security in mind. Thanks to a branded power supply, over voltage protection, and overload protection are guaranteed, safeguarding your machine from potentially harmful power fluctuation. 
Not too hot, not too cold. We made the sweet melting spot just right. SHARK’s heated bed can heat up quickly to 100°C. It’s well built and customized to meet the demands of temperature for a wide variety of filaments.  
Better performance with less power consumption. It supports six motor drivers, five end-stop switches and five controllable high power outputs. Thanks to the built-in controlling software for laser engraving and bicolor printing, no need to recode or further adjustment, plug and play with Shark. But that’s not all, Shark's motherboard speeds up the gcode files loading and supports OctoPrint, long file name and automatic leveling algorithm, optimizing printing with ease.
32-bit processor
Essential tools for 3D printing, the middleman between your work and idea. SHARK offers free 2-in-1 slicer software for 3D printing and laser engraving, perfect fit for not just beginners but also advanced users who want to print without hassle. 
Supporting Windows & Mac, key features and parameters of software as below:
3D printing 
1) Optimization of bicolor printing
2) Provide high-quality, normal, medium-speed printing, fast printing configuration options
3) Model preview function
Laser engraving 
1) Involving algorithms: Floy interpolation method, Burkers halftone algorithm
2) General parameters: length and width, power, working speed;3) Vector picture parameters: gray value
4) Gray image parameters: contour extraction algorithm parameter values
5) Black and white picture parameters: gray value
Have no idea how to set up the device? No worries, we've got you covered. LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK is pre-assembled inbox already. Build it up effortlessly in 5-10 mins, and you are ready to print.  
As for now, LOTMAXX has a powerful team with more than 100 talented and professionals. More than 70% of them are from the 3D printing, consumer electronics and machinery manufacturing industry.  
The LOTMAXX Team
Take a look at our key members:
Jason  Liao: Chief executive officer(CEO)
More than 10 years of business management and successfully handled 16 technology entrepreneurship projects.
Joe Zheng: Chief technology officer(CTO)
18 years of experience in technology products development and 8 years of relevant R&D experience in 3D printing.
Ivan Huang - Senior supply chain director
More than 15 years of experience in supply chain and production management.
Gathering together out of a passion and enthusiasm for 3D printing technology, we've made it our goal to provide better 3D printing and services for beginners and professionals. We want to break a new ground of 3D printing technology, that's why we've been investing more than 40% of annual turnovers on research and development.
We're here to be part of the revolution. Support now and join us on the mission.



Multiview of SC-10 Shark
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our first Kickstarter campaign. To date, we have delivered over 10,000 units to users in over 100 countries. We are using the same supply base that we established over the past two years through our first product. And we continue to improve our production process and technics process. We’ve also selected the best suppliers in this industry. We feel confident that we will ensure product quality and hit the delivery dates we are providing.

SC-10 SHARK is a faster machine . There could be unexpected risks that can arise during the pilot production. We will ship once our product can meet or exceed these high standards.

It is important to understand that unexpected things can happen, and sometimes they are hard to predict. Delays in shipping can occur due to factors like trade wars and viruses, but we have minimized the risks of delays through the measures mentioned above. However, if a delay would happen we will make sure to inform all the backers of the situation and communicate with full transparency.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Environmentally friendly factories
我会挑选一间能尽量减少环境污染的工厂

updates.update_content:
Hi All, 
We thank you so much for the great support. Till now all the backers printer was shipped. 
If you are still haven't your printer in hand. Pls reach out service@lotmaxx.com for double check. 
and for tech support or after-sales service, pls contact service team. For further orders,  pls visit lotmaxx official online store   www.lotmaxx3d.com

updates.update_userinfo: Tracking info Update: The rest of orders arrived in DE!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
The printer has arrived in DE, it would arrive in our overseas warehouse first after the customs clearance is finished, then there will be a new separate tracking number for you. 
Don't worry, SC-10 Shark is running towards you in fast speed!

updates.update_content:

New tracking number has been sent to your mailbox, the package will be delivered to your home very soon.

updates.update_content:

Your shark is being delivered to your address!
A new individual tracking number has been generated and sent to your email address.
Shipping method is by Canada Post.

updates.update_content:

The shark is being delivered to your home, it will meet you very soon.

You can send email to us if you want to know your individual tracking number.(For European backers)

Sorry for the delay of tracking number.

Container number：BEAU5673001(By COSCO)

updates.update_userinfo: Tracking info updated: USA Orders Created Labels on 22,Aug!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
Tracking info has been updated for a part of USA orders created label on 22, Aug.🥳
Sorry, shark can't speed up the speed of delivery. 🤝The tracking information update is delayed because some orders are goes in LCL, the customs clearance speed of different cabinets may be different, so many of you will have feedback: US orders that created labels on 24,Aug will be faster than US orders are created labels on 22, Aug. All depends on the speed of customs clearance, please be patient, the shark has already rushed to you!

Dear Canadian Backers,
The  parcel label number(By UPS): is as follows:
1Z8A092W2004183091
 1Z8A092W2012776873

At that time, please pay attention to your phone number and sign for the package in time.

project_data.project_name: LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK: 3D Printing Level Up.

campaign.story:
Review Videos (Updating)
#1 Naomi's Review
#2 3D printing Nerd’s review
#3 Nery's Live
 #4 CHEP - NEW! Creality CR-6 SE 3D Printer - Better than Ender 3?
 #5 Tweakers - Creality CR-6 SE - 3d-printen zonder zorgen over bijzaken
 #6 Teaching Tech: Creality CR-6 SE - Your questions answered!
#7  3D Printing Nerd (Joel Telling): Should You Back It On KICKSTARTER?
 #8 Make: First Look: Creality CR6-se 3D Printer
 #9 3DMN: Creality CR-6 SE - First Look and Test
Meet CR-6 SE MAX
The Autodesk Kickstarter test, which looks at an FDM printer’s precision. 
CR-6 SE scored a total of 26.5 out of 30 points, which shows its great precision. 
Dimensional Accuracy: Score of 4
Fine Flow Control: Score of 2.5
Fine Negative Features: Score of 5
Overhangs: Score of 5
Bridging: Score of 5
XY Resonance: Score of 2.5
Z-axis alignment: Score of 2.5
Here are the more details for your reference: https://bit.ly/3cPokik
PLAY

# Video of Little Benchy Printing
PLAY

 # Video about easy feed-in with filament
PLAY

Kickstarter as a global leader in the community, it gathered a lot of creative people, as well as the geek, we see a lot of the project of 3D printing, backers are very active in expressing their views, it can greatly inspire us to create a better product, this is the reason why we pay attention to the Kickstarter platform. So on the occasion of the 6th anniversary, we launched this new product, we hope that through this new product, we can establish a very good relationship with the backers on  Kickstarter. We hope that they can actively participate in the research and development of our product. Of course, we are willing to accept their challenges and welcome their Suggestions. We want to build this kind of long-term, deep, and healthy interaction with them.

From printing urgently needed medical equipment to cater to other specific needs through the use of 3D printing, this is a technology that has gained an unprecedented angle of social impact. That’s why we’re even more strongly committed to enabling the ease of use and affordability of this technology by developing the CR-6 SE 3D Printer and making it available to every creative mind out there.
Harnessing the power of 3D printing shouldn’t be as expensive and complicated as it has been. That’s why we created Creality’s CR-6 SE DIY 3D Printer, a simple and robust aluminum-built modular 3D printer that features an intelligent leveling-free system for superior accuracy and advanced 3D printing features, in an easy-to-use printer that is also affordable.
No complications. No special skills required. No confusion. Your CR-6 SE is ready to use out of the box. You can easily assemble it in only 5 minutes and then all you need to do is plug it in and switch it on. The CR-6 SE 3D Printer starts working and delivering amazing results—whether you’re a pro or a newbie—in almost no time!

For the most part, accurate 3D printing is the result of a leveled bed. That’s usually a challenging goal, though, because most 3D printers will present nozzle clogging, poor adhesion, and generally unleveled-related issues that compromise the quality of prints. The CR-6 SE offers precisely the opposite. Featuring an innovative true Leveling-Free Technology, this is a 3D Printer that lets you always rely on highly accurate results.

Never see your creativity and productivity affected by nozzle-related replacement issues. The CR-6 SE is designed with a modular nozzle that means you can customize it. From the heat block to the nozzle tip, among other parts, this is a Modular 3D Printer that’s easy to keep!
Better heat dissipation with unique caved heat sink
With its compact and reliable extruder, you know that a smoother extrusion and an easier filament feed will ultimately generate faster, quieter and smoother prints. Yes, this is what perfect 3D printing is all about!
Photoelectric filament sensor and flexible fixator

3D printers shouldn’t be annoying in the noise they make, which is why we added a Silent Chipset to the CR-6 SE. Its latest Trinamic driver helps to ensure that voltage control, fast movement and printing in silence are a given. We know: you’ll thank us dearly for that!
You only want hot, excellent, superb printing results, right? Well, the CR-6 SE 3D Printer comes with a carborundum glass hotbed platform that is flatter than aluminum and which offers a stellar thermal performance that ensures quick heating up, strong adhesion and prints that are easy to remove.
The CR-6 SE 3D Printer looks as strong as it is. It also looks very stylish! This amazing work station has a beautiful design that compliments any desktop you use it on. Meanwhile, self-designed profiles and stepper motor cover prevent from filament scraps and dust. The CR-6 SE also comes with a well-arranged ribbon cable that ensures safety issues are never a concern.
Sounds like the perfect 3D printing equation, right? This unique printer is designed with a wider foundation and equipped with dual Z-axises matched with an adjustable timing belt that translates into reduced unwanted motion and improved refined results. So the stability of the machine and its performance is simply impressive.
Weighing only 9.2kg and with manageable dimensions (442*462*540mm), the CR-6 SE is a 3D Printer that you can carry. In fact, it features a convenient removable handle that makes it easy to carry whenever you need to.
User experience improved by optimized details like sealed aluminum profiles, foldable filament holder, tools storage box, belt tensioner. 
Toolbox
Foldable spool holder
Adjustable belt tensioner
Flexible hotbed fixator


These are the three magic words that basically mean that your CR-6 SE will keep your printing performance running smartly and smoothly. If the machine suddenly runs out of filament or if it simply breaks, the printer’s photoelectric filament sensor will instantly pick up that disruption and will stop the machine. As soon as the new filament feeds in, the CR-6 SE will resume its operation without making you lose your work.
Did the power suddenly or accidentally go off? No worries! The CR-6 SE 3D Printer will resume printing if the power supply is interrupted. That’s right—you can forget about starting over because print failure is no longer an issue!

The CR-6 SE 3D Printer features a 4.3in HD Color LCD Touch Screen that allows you to easily and intuitively operate the device. Available in English and Chinese, and with a simplified and smart interface, this Touch Screen ensures that this very special printer’s user experience always equates to smooth sailing!
No dust, Neat and Notable
CR-6 SE revamps in quites a distinguished look. From the bottom to the top, the flat aluminum profiles makes the machine stylish and prevent from dust.
All-around Safety
Hassel free printing with over current protection, over-load protection, and thermal runaway protection, always keep your mind at peace.
Whatever you think of creating and shaping, the CR-6 SE 3D Printer is the powerful, convenient and creative sidekick you need. This is the printer that literally lets you unleash and give shape to your creativity.
Print your product, create prototypes, or develop complex 3D printed tools and devices. There are as many industrial applications for what the CR-6 SE 3D Printer as you can think of!
The CR-6 SE 3D Printer allows you to create spectacularly detailed architecture models, whether you need to present a project to a client or simply want to unleash your architectural creativity.
CR-6 SE Package

※ These specs may change later in the development and verification process. If there is any change, we will inform you in time.
The Freight of Enclosure:
[Add-ons] How to add Kickstarter add-ons to pledge?
Just follow the steps below (For example):
1. Find your pledge.
               2. If you want One Screen kit just add USD $35 (HKD $271.3) into your reward price manually. Please feel free to add more add-ons if you want.
               3. Enter your payment information.
We will send a survey to all our backers when we finished the project, and you can note what Add-Ons you have added in your pledge.
Based in Shenzhen, China, at Creality 3D we’re leading 3D printing manufacturers and innovators with a special commitment to be the 3D printing evangelist and bringing to market the most advanced and powerful 3D printers. We’re pioneers in the R&D and mass production of FDM and Resin 3D printers in China. Whether it is for individuals, families, schools or businesses, we always strive to create the best and most cost-effective 3D printers to cater to the specific needs of every person and group.


This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarter launches with 1,400+ successful Kickstarter projects and over $500M raised in total.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Like all Kickstarter projects, we will face certain risks and challenges in delivering this product at the quality we demand of ourselves. However, the Creality team brings with it not only our passion but experience in engineering and manufacturing at scale, and we've made every effort to mitigate these risks for our backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
English/Français
Re PLICC, - the sound of love - : She is creating a brand new sound. Her début EP (Extended Play - half album) is a fusion of the Zulu (SouthAfrican) drum & the European PopRock sound. Re PLICC, le son de l'amour; elle crée un nouveau son : Premier EP (la moitié d'un album) est une fusion de batterie Zulu (Sud-Africain) & le son PopRock Européen.
The Idea/L'idée
Summary
Re PLICC's music career has taken off, her new single "A Life Of Constant Longing" released in stores August 2015 is building momentum. We are excited for the completion of the recording of her début EP coming soon, February 2016. The EP constitute of 6 songs in total; 3 English songs, 2 French songs & 1 Zulu song (including the released single). All songs carry a signature Boom-bit (sound) inspired by Re Plicc in blending cultures. The full album is called "LightConeTheShift" and is scheduled to be completed by August 2016. The full album has 11 songs + a bonus track. 
Join us, in this amazing journey!
La carrière musicale de Re PLICC a pris son envol! Son nouveau single vient de décoller et est sorti dans les magasins en Août 2015. Nous prévoyons de terminer l'enregistrement de l'EP en Février 2016. L'EP constituent de 6 chansons au total, dont « A Life Of Constant Longing » le single est déjà sorti ; composé de 3 chansons en Anglais, 2 en Français et une chanson en Zulu. Toutes les chansons portent une signature Boom-sonore inspirée de Re Plicc dans le mélange des cultures. L'album complet est appelé «LightConeTheShift» et il est prévu d'être terminé en Août 2016. L'album complet possède 11 chansons + un bonus track.
Rejoignez-nous, dans cette incroyable aventure !
Introduction
I'm a Singer/Songwriter & a Humanitarian. It almost feels as though every single event of my life was a building block for this very moment: Je suis auteur - interprète. C’est presque comme si chaque moments de ma vie c'était produit dans le but d’arriver à cet instant précis.
A moment of living fully as myself, and yet it's only just the beginning. Un instant de conscience totale de moi-même, de vivre pleinement ce que je suis, et pourtant ce n’est que le début !
Like all prophetesses I tell stories of hope and I encourage love above fear especially when it comes to change or transformation. Comme toutes prophétesses, je raconte des histoires d’espérance et j’encourage la victoire de l’amour sur la peur, en particulier lorsque vient le temps du changement.
From Aerospace to music, yet nothing is lost because our experiences constitute a part of our profile (see personal bio). De l’aéronautique à la musique, rien n’est perdu, parce que nos expériences sont parties intégrantes de nous même (confère biographie).
I don't just tell of change, I am an embodiment of change!
Hi my name is Re PLICC!
Je ne fais pas juste que de parler de changement, j’incarne le changement ! 
Salut ! Je m’appelle Re PLICC !
Re PLICC
The Process/Le Processus
This is very exciting because it has granted Re the opportunity to be hands-on, to create her own team, to carry the vision & build the project from scratch. C'est vraiment génial parce qu'il a accordé Re la possibilité d'être créatrice, de monter sa propre équipe: de construire ce projet à partir de rien.
This has been wonderful start because it has been a global project; The producers in Nashville from "The SongWriting Team"produced the song: we worked together of course with the melody and the musical production of the song to create this new sound. A sound that supports the story! Then the song was mixed in Toulouse. And finally it was mastered by a mastering engineer from "Blue Grotto Sound LLC" - Sean Spence who is originally from South Africa and now lives in Nashville with his family.
Cela a été merveilleux parce que ce projet est international. La chanson a été produite par un professionnel à Nashville (USA). Nous avons travaillés ensemble sur la mélodie et la production sonore pour créer ce nouveau son ! Puis la chanson a été mixée à Toulouse (FR). Et enfin elle a été masterisée par un ingénieur du son d'origine Sud Africaine vivant à Nashville (USA).
This international collaboration of work is exactly what has made this project interesting. A team of musicians came together, which is a representation of a global network, this means we can come together and unite to produce something wonderful.
Cette collaboration internationale a rendu ce projet très intéressant. Nous pouvons tous partager cela, parce que l'équipe qui s'est rassemblé pour créer ce projet est la représentation même d'un réseau multiculturel : Quand nous pouvons nous unir, nous pouvons nous rassembler pour produire quelque chose de merveilleux
Production Process
Re PLICC's Studio Recording
Creating The Distribution Network as an Independent artist
Re Plicc's Distribution Approach
The Sound/Le Son
Growing up in KwaZulu Natal in South Africa; I am Zulu, so it's that Zulu drum that bits on your chest (boom boo boom boo boom boom boo boom). The hybrid - the fusion, the blending of the 2, the European sound which is pop rock sound, a sound I got accustom to when I joined the PopRock band in Toulouse. Together the two have created a new sound which I call the Re PLICC boom-bit sound and I am excited to share that with you. I am hoping that you will enjoy it and together we can create something new, a new style!
J'ai grandi à Kwa-Zulu Natal en Afrique du Sud; je suis Zulu; et je transmets le son du tambour Zulu qui bats dans mon coeur (boom boo boom ...). J'ai voulu mélanger cela avec un son pop rock Européen, en rejoignant un groupe PopRock à Toulouse. Ces 2 influences ont crée un nouveau son que j'appelle le son Re PLICC boom-bit ! Et je suis heureuse de le partager avec vous ! J'espère que vous l'apprécierez et qu'ensemble nous pouvons créer quelque chose de nouveau... Un nouveau style !
I believe it represents who I am, it is also something new, something which needs to find it's place in the market.
Je pense que cela représente vraiment qui je suis. Mais c'est vraiment quelque chose d'INNOVANT, quelque chose qui doit trouver sa place dans le marché.
The Product
Re PLICC's first single "A Life Of Constant Longing" is our prototype. A song dedicated to immigration, starting anew and movement: Songs that tell stories. This is one of our slowest songs. The sound or instrumental was also created to support the story. E.g the aircraft engine sound at the beginning of the song, the center instrument -the drums, the violin to be the second voice and the pounding piano to support the drums, and others. We projected distribution for August 2015 and it was ready on time, exactly 31 July the song was ready for distribution.
Song Lyrics: http://media.wix.com/ugd/3f3c8d_229fe6a1320743ca8e82ec957e5b5f8e.pdf
Re PLICC's 2015 - Toulouse - Live Shows
The Goal /L'objectif
Then the essence of my music is to unify humanity. To highlight that we are not that different. We are all the same! As human beings we want the same things: we want to create, we want to make a difference. We want to matter!
L'essence même de ma musique est d'unir l'humanité. Pour que l'on se rende compte que nous sommes proches les uns des autres. En tant qu'humains, nous voulons la même chose: nous voulons créer, nous voulons faire la différence, nous voulons compter pour quelque chose.
My songs represent that; in the songs in which I write, I am creating a new path: humanity need a platform to say the things that they feel or to tell their story. I describe myself as a story teller and the stories in which I tell, they might be personal but sometimes they are not, it can be a story of that boy or a story of that girl.
Mes chansons représentent cela; les chansons que j'écris essayent de créer une nouvelle voie. Les gens ont besoin d'un moyen pour dire les choses qu'ils ressentent ou pour raconter leur histoire. Je me décris comme une conteuse d'histoires, et dans ces histoires que je conte, il arrive que ce soit une expérience personnelle mais pas toujours, cela peux être aussi l'histoire de ce garçon, ou bien l'histoire de cette fille...
We are organized, accountable and have what it takes to manage a global project, meeting every milestone! We can only improve from here, vocally, resource wise and overall performance and with your support Re and her team can achieve that. Backing this project gives you a chance to be part of something historical, a start of something new.
Lila Wallace, from the Wallace Foundation once said "the arts belong to everyone.” We need your help, so we may continue to create and to share. Together, we can Kickstart a new sound, a new style, and a new consciousness! Above that, this campaign will also build a community and promote Re PLICC's overall vision; which begins by the construction of the African calendar in February 2016; see bio for more details.
When you support Re Plicc by backing this project, you ignite a flame. Below attached is the picture of the structure:
Lila Wallace, de la Wallace Foundation à dit « L'art appartient à tout le monde. » Nous avons besoin de votre aide, pour continuer à créer et à partager. Ensemble, nous pouvons démarrer un nouveau son, un nouveau style et une nouvelle conscience ! Cette campagne sera également un élan et pourra promouvoir une vision globale de Re PLICC ; qui commence par la construction du calendrier Africain en février 2016 ; Voir bio pour plus de détails.
Lorsque vous sauvegardez ce projet vous allumez une flamme. Voir l'image ci-dessous :
Structure
The Budget
The Budget
Prizes & Cost Savings
Prizes (Dresses) & Cost Savings
Key Holder Gift - Re's Logo
 Re PLICC’s Site & SocialMedia Links:
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/re-plicc 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/REplicc
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Re.PLICC 
about.me: https://about.me/PLICC 
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/cebileridge/ 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/replicc/ 
Linkedin: fr.linkedin.com/in/replicc 
Plicc: https://plicc.wordpress.com 
GWRM: https://gwrm.wordpress.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Working with multinationals in a multicultural environment with different time zones is tricky especially when it comes to communication and expectations. Trust, respect and patience is crucial. Re Plicc's life experiences combined with the Aviation/Aerospace background and education has prepared her for a multicultural environment, applying different methods of approach when it comes to communications.
 
Her first song "A Life Of Constant Longing" recording process has been a true learning curve - learning the system, how the industry works, how to manage as an independent artist. Most importantly understanding which stages of the song recording require extra time and stamina and how to pace ourselves to maximize our resources in the future. We also plan to collaborate with other artists & players in the music industry to help us produce world class tracks on this project.
 
We are growing, the people we have in our network today, did not exist 3months ago. To create a even greater product, it's a matter of a great team and resources.

Through music social networks such as SoundBetter, Re Plicc was able to meet people from across the globe who are willing to contribute towards the project, living her as the project coordinator with only one crucial task; choosing the right team.
 
Check Out Re PLICC's reviews from other musicians on this link below:
https://soundbetter.com/profiles/12513-re-p#reviews
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hello Friends,
The time has finally come!
Over the last four years we’ve been designing a portable, powerful, rechargeable light to make you look great for video chats and selfies.  It’s called Chatlight!
We’ve created a team with years of experience, as well as trusted contacts to make this happen successfully. The testing, research and development is done and our prototype is ready to go!  However, we need your support so that we can pay for the molds needed to make this product a reality.
Production and manufacturing are in place, but we need your contribution to put us in motion!
Many Thanks,
Henry and Ian
Founders Video
In The News

Product Shots
Key Features
Evolution Of Chatlight
Initial vision from 2008
Over 14 prototypes have been created to find the perfect balance of lighting and ease of use.
The Founders
Henry Geddes began his career in photography at the International Center of Photography in New York City and gained his expertise by working with the largest and most fabled photo studios in the city. In 2001, this led to the launch of his own production facility, Splashlight Studios. With clients like Neiman Marcus, Calvin Klein, Barneys, Warner Brothers, Nike, Porsche, Macy’s, Vogue, Elle and W, Henry understands how important proper lighting is for presentation.
Splashlight Studios has grown significantly over the past 13 years and today successfully operates out of New York, Montreal and Miami, as one of the most recognized and respected names in the industry.
With over 15 years of experience as entrepreneur, business owner, and photographer, Henry understands the importance of lighting solutions and related products for good quality video chats.
In 2010, with designs for illumination devices he partnered with friend and online media specialist, Ian Shiell. Ian joined Henry to help manage the operations of bringing an ambitious product like Chatlight to life.
Over the last decade Ian developed the habit of starting companies, building up their presence online, growing brand recognition and selling companies—after which he moved to his next successful startup.
Rewards
 Production Timeline
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are very aware of the fulfillment risks and challenges that can occur which is why we added 2 partners to our team who together have over 40 years of experience in bringing products to market. From concept, factory selection and quality control to distribution, we are assured that our promise to deliver will be more than accurate. Our fulfillment partners here in the USA are very experienced in the distribution of electric products such as the Chatlight and we feel very confident in their ability to make sure product is on time as promised.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: Check out our co-founder Henry Geddes being interviewed on CBS’s 3 Time Emmy Award Winning Show Innovation Nation this Saturday at 10:00 AM EST!

Hi Backers,
Chatlight will begin shipping out to you today!  Thank you again for all of your loyalty and support!

If you have any questions, please email our Support Department at support@chatlight.com.

We just received notification that the Chatlight production will be completed within 4 days!  We will be talking more with our team over the next couple of days and will pass along shipping information as soon as we get it.
If your shipping address has changed within the past 4 months or so, please email support@chatlight.com so we can update our records.

Hello Backers,
We would like to say that we are overwhelmed with all of the patience and support that we have received via email over the past couple of weeks. We would like to thank you all again!
Last week we were told that the factory in China was shut down for a week for a Chinese holiday. We were not shocked as we have found that nothing has been really easy about working with a Chinese factory. Our goal is to ultimately bring everything back to the United States for manufacturing as we feel we will have much more control. With that said, we are very close. We have arranged the shipping to get us the units as well as the shipping to send all of the units out to you. We are hoping to get the call next week that the units are done and are being shipped. As soon as we get the email or call, we will notify you immediately!

Our test run has arrived!! We have been putting the Chatlights through brightness, charge longevity and recharge speed tests and all is looking good to go for the final run. With the help of our families, the units have also survived a few unintentional drop to the floor tests!
Barring any shipping or customs issues, we are beginning final production runs this week. 2-3 weeks and we should have the lights in hand ready to ship to you all.

As always, please feel free to reach out to us with any questions or concerns!

We hope you are having a wonderful summer!
Here at Chatlight headquarters in South Florida, we are feeling the heat BIG TIME, not only because of the thermometer hitting 100 every day, but also because our factory is far behind schedule.  It pains us to report this.  We are doing our best to get some firm dates as soon as possible.
We were recently alerted that due to the thickness of the paint-finish, our molds had to be reconfigured by 1mm, causing the delay. The reconfiguration needed to be done and our position on the production schedule was re-allotted.  Good news is that it has been dealt with and we will be finishing up very soon, hopefully within the next week. Packing and shipping will follow.

THANK YOU BACKERS!
Please visit the link below to see our personal thanks to you all:
http://www.chatlight.com/thank-you-backers.html
We are currently in testing and are so excited to be extremely close to final production! We will keep you posted as the shipping time is drawing near.  In the meanwhile, thank you all again for supporting our Kickstarter Campaign for Chatlight!

Hi Chatlight Backers!
Just wanted to give you a couple of quick updates…
Next week, we will be finalizing the design for our retail packaging.
In 2-3 weeks, Henry will be making his trip to the factory to ensure that everything is perfect before hitting the home stretch! At that time, we should be able to share some pictures with you as well as have a good idea of a possible shipping date.

Hi Chatlight Backers!
 It has been way too long and an update is well overdue. We are painfully aware of this and apologize for the delay in communications.
Our contacts at the factory initially had some difficulty incorporating a few minor improvements to make the Chatlight even better, but this has since been resolved. These changes were in response to some useful backer feedback we received during the campaign and involved making the LED surface area slightly larger and squeezing in a couple additional LEDs. The time that it took for us to properly test and implement the changes set us back a couple of weeks. We are not happy about the delay, but we felt that the changes were necessary to make the Chatlight everything that we all expect it to be.

Kickstarter is only the beginning!
Kickstarter has been a fantastic journey and we want to express our gratitude for riding with us! Chatlight is now part of the prestigious list of design products funded by Kickstarter and we could not be more thrilled.  While our campaign brought an incredible load to tackle and we are so proud to have been able to pull it off, the real heroes are you!

project_data.project_name: CHATLIGHT: Studio Quality Lighting For Video Chat

campaign.story:
The MOKIBOX is a portable WiFi speaker that is going to provide a fantastic audio experience for the listener, regardless if the sound originates from a tablet, a smartphone, or even sync from the cloud library.
THE MOKIBOX - Internet Speaker
The First Real WiFi + HiFi Speaker
AirPlay and DLNA 
MOKIBOX can directly access a cloud audio library 
Manage your audio files no matter where you are. 
No wireless network available? Don’t worry. Your smartphone can control MOKIBOX by a direct WiFi connection.
MOKIBOX can be a standalone player
MOKIBOX is equipped with built-in memory.
MOKIBOX can play music on its own – no need for any other device.
Timer and Alarm
The timer function enables you to easily set a timer. MOKIBOX can also be your alarm. You can also choose any songs you like to serve as your alarm. 
Cloud-based audio library management
MOKIBOX also allows people to transfer audio files over the cloud.
As shown in the video, Dad in one city can upload an audio file to the cloud. Mum in a different city can “sync” the file, which downloads the file to the MOKIBOX and the son having a birthday will hear his dad’s message on scheduled. 
The Party Need Never Stop! 
Smartphone users will love MOKIBOX because of a special feature we’ve developed just for them!   
You’ll never be interrupted by sudden calls
When you’re listening to music on your phone and dancing or laughing with friends, what happens when you get an incoming call? The music stops, and your friends have to wait until you’re done with the call before they can start grooving to the music again.
No longer!
MOKIBOX will continue to play music to the rest of the room while you’re on your phone chatting with your friend, colleague from work, or family member!
Keep playing music even if your smartphone runs out of battery
Your friends are coming over for a party on your back deck, and you’ve created a special playlist to run throughout the party. But you were a bit careless, and the battery on your mobile device is beeping at you. 
No problem!
MOKIBOX can be controlled from any device within your house – from the app you’ve downloaded to your smartphone or from the MOKIBOX itself.
Premium Quality
These premium-quality speakers are made of aluminum, not like other wireless speakers. The aluminum frame provides a stable structure to ensure the best performance
Design Process
 We wanted to do stuff that other wireless speakers simply couldn’t do. 

Project Timeline
We currently have completed the industrial design and have a fully functional prototype. After raising funds on Kickstater, the fund will be used for bulk manufacturing. 
Rewards
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
From design to production, every creative product has risks .
In order to avoid as much risk as possible, our team has done a lot of preparation and testing of the MOKIBOX.

We spent many, many hours working on our design, based on our thorough market research, and the design of the MOKIBOX has undergone several revisions before we decided that we had incorporated all the features that would make it the best portable speaker ....ever.

Many delays occur in manufacturing. In order to try to be proactive about delays, we found a trusted manufacturer who has a reputation of being able to produce high quality hi-tech products.

In addition, they have a complete set of quality control processes to insure every part of the MOKIBOX meets specifications before it is put together.

In order to ensure the best user experience, our team member have tested our prototypes many times to make sure every detail and every function of the MOKIBOX works to perfection.

Because of our preparation, we are confident that we will be able to deliver our MOKIBOX on time to our backers and eventually, to our market. If any event does occur that will set back production, of course we’ll update everyone here on our campaign page.

We’re ready to go into production with this fantastic product. All we need now is your backing.

Please help bring the MOKIBOX to you, your family and friends – and even total strangers (c’mon, spread the musical wealth!) by sharing this campaign with your friends and spreading the word throughout your social media reach.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.creator_bio:
MOKISOUND
First created · 0 backed
MOKISOUND is a manufacturer of electronic gadgets, seeks to provide consumers with a product that would give them a wonderful music...See more

updates.update_content:
Many thanks for your great support every time! 
 Merry Christmas!

Thank you so much for all your support! The team and I want to thank everyone who has backed or supported the MOKIBOX. With your support, we are 28% of our goal with 21 days to go, but we need your help to keep the momentum going Please share with your friends and family, tweet, post on facebook, or do whatever else you can to spread the word.
 We also want to share some press endorsements with you.

project_data.project_name: MOKIBOX: Portable Aluminum WIFI Speaker with Premium Sound

campaign.story:
What is xDroid
The xDroid is more than just an App; it’s an extension of one’s self thanks to its next-generation interface.  Users need only set up their own profile with their needs, preferences and interests and xDroid will take one’s own priorities into account when carrying out any task it’s given. The fast and easy to use interface and native connections to one’s own social networks gives everyone incredibly easy access in helping you achieve your results or share your activities with friends and family.
Virtual Assistant (Task Manager) 
Need to purchase a plane ticket but don’t have time to search all the sites to find the best deal?  Looking for the nearest yoga studio or massage? Anything you need or want will be searched for you.  Just put your inquiry in, sit back and  let  XDROID do all the work for you and watch all the answers come flowing in.
Your High-Tech xDroid Profile is Low Maintenance.
Set up your xDroid user profile specifying what your needs and interests are including anything you may wish to sell online, what you are looking for - including activities and recommendations- keeping xDroid simple easy and simple to navigate. The user interface is years ahead of its time with its sleek look and advanced technology, communicating has never been faster or easier between human and app.
xDroid Smart Search
xDroid users will enjoy the benefit of Smart Search which can persist in finding exactly what one wants even if that result is not available at present. A key example of Smart Search in action is  specifying a particular plane ticket at a particular price on a particular day to a particular destination – xDroid will continue searching, - for hours or days – looking for a match to the specified criteria.
 Convenient and fast interface
Social Relation Tree
There is a handy tool to access relevant information from friends, colleagues, friends of friends, etc. You can track what your friends might be selling, items/services or products they might be looking for so you can help them find it, sell it, buy it. You can even pass along all this information to your community of contacts and friends. This tool will be a great resource for connecting with people for business and much more.
Offers
    Explore 
  Profile
xDroid Story
xDroid is the first intelligent Digital Assistant that combines both a social media community and search engine to analyze your needs and desires, returning those results in one comprehensive portal.
 Imagine xDroid as your Digital Assistant, which will simplify your life - xDroid is a unique Exchange Platform for sharing services, experiences, impressions, tips and assistance. 
Our social media platform will enable you to connect with friends, buy and sell stuff, and see your friends’ activities. With the app you can create a comprehensive profile, which may include your favorite brands of clothing, cars, musical instruments, services and more delivering the most comprehensive results — tailored specifically for you. 
The xDroid technology contains a powerful search engine that delivers immediate and ongoing results with updates and changes to pricing and availability by continuously crawling the web to deliver revised information until which time the app has delivered the ideal results you are seeking.
The opportunity to answer calls free of charge, view and respond to SMS, organize video chat without leaving the app. Plus you program your sms message send time, HD video calls. You can schedule a phone call, a text message or HD video call to be delivered at your convenience. What if you want your message erased as soon as it is read, seen or heard? Well with xDroid, this is possible!
Seeking and providing the most profitable offer based on user input. Imagine having your shoe size and style, brand names you shop, for stores you shop at and the prices you are willing to pay come to you, instead of you having to search yourself. Or your favorite music, sports memorabilia, cars, colognes, perfume the list goes on and on.  Our notification center will deliver search results that are specific to your buying preferences, needs and at what price you willing to pay. The best thing is you won’t have to input all that information more than once! All this will help you to save time and money.
SOS option. With this tool you can reach out to your friends and get help on any subject or problem in real time. For Example; have you ever had a time when you didn't know what movie a certain actor played in? Or you need help on a computer issue and don't want to spend hours on a tech support call? How about being on the side of the road after your car acts up but are not sure what to do? This tool will help you get the answers from the people you know and trust by simply putting out a targeted message!
Birthday Technology. Do you find it difficult to find what to buy a friend or family member for their birthday? You want to give them something they like and can use but you don't want to ruin the surprise? This option will solve those dilemmas.  You can search your friends likes, buying preferences and more information open to you as their friend to help you find the perfect gift. Another feature of this tool is the system can group best friends and notify your friends what you or they might want for a birthday present so the group can split expenses. For example, if you want an iPhone the system will find the best deal in the marketplace and multiple friends can go in on the gift. 
 xDroid App Video
PLAY

xDroid Custom Color App (only for kickstarter backers)
xDroid T-shirt
Customized iPhone and Samsung cover (Dark)
Customized iPhone and Samsung cover (Light)
Incubated within the cutting-edge curriculum of the Business & Entrepreneurship Department of Columbia College Chicago - an international leader and recognized pioneer in arts and media education. 
Our team
Timeline
Rewards
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
In the development of any app, there is a potential for delays. We have done our best to pad our schedule allowing for the unforeseen, but there is always a chance of product development taking longer than we expected. 

We have been working on xDroid App for almost two years with our own funding, thousands of hours in production hours and testing. The funds we seek will help us get to the finish line in bringing this app to market. 

Our team is committed to producing an app you feel excited about and proud to show your family, friends and acquaintances as the next “Must Have" on your phone or tablet. Think of xDroid as your friend, trusted resource, motivator, personal shopper, travel agent, social director, search engine and ability to communicate with real people for real everyday wants and needs-all with the click of a button. 

We are open and counting on feedback from the Kickstarter community. This app is made to help everyday people do whatever they are already doing in an easier, faster and more efficient way. Let us hear from you!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Laser Lapel is an upscale men's fashion accessory. Much like the recessed ambient lighting found on luxury vehicles and yachts, Laser Lapels create a high-class style that is unmistakable. Any night out can turn epic with an attractive indirect accent light behind your jacket lapel. Laser Lapel is well made and easily attaches to your favorite jacket. No alterations necessary.
 As with any new business, we are focused on creating visibility in the marketplace to promote name and product awareness. We intend to pre-sell a few thousand lapels on Kickstarter and then continue our product and brand development, along with direct marketing promotions (and some partying) in Las Vegas, Miami, New York, Austin, Los Angles, Paris, London, Madrid, Rome, Mexico City, Hong Kong, Toronto and Dubai. We also have an amazing line of women's accessories planned, and several opportunities for licensing / cross brand promotion. *patent pending
@ The Cosmopolitan Las Vegas (Thanks, Matt Calli)
The Lapels have 36 hours of continuous radiant light (per replaceable battery) and easily attach with 3M 2 sided tape.
http://www.laserlapel.com/            #LZRLPL            info@laserlapel.com
$7 backer reward
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The greatest hurdles we see in our near term are with scaling and logistics. All of our manufacturing has been sourced to China. We can produce several thousand in a relatively short amount of time, but we may need to source from multiple suppliers if an exceptionally large order is placed.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
